summary: A configuration object that encapsulates all parameters needed to construct a Transformer block, usable for both encoder and decoder components. It specifies model dimensions, positional encoding settings, layer‑norm placement (pre or post), and whether the block should be reversible.
business_intent: Enable developers to define and reuse consistent Transformer block specifications across different parts of a model, simplifying architecture setup and ensuring uniformity in hyper‑parameter configuration.
